attributes.action: request that MPs of all parties meet with thier constituents in public to discuss the expenses debacle
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to establist the honesty and integrity of our mps they should meet with thier constituents to discuss the expenses fiasco.and come clean om any claims they have made.
This issue is not going to go away irrespective of other news hitting the headlines.We send them to the house of commons we pay to keep them there and we now need answers.Failure to do so will be remembered at the general election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
